SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.api

Interface IPermissionsManagerSpigot

All Superinterfaces:
IPermissionsManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
VaultManager
public interface IPermissionsManagerSpigot extends IPermissionsManager
This interface is used to provide a permissions manager for Spigot.

    Methods inherited from interface nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.IPermissionsManager

    getMaxPermissionSuffix, hasBypassPermissionsForAttribute, hasPermission, hasPermissionToCreateStructure, isOp

  • Method Details

    • getMaxPermissionSuffix

      OptionalInt getMaxPermissionSuffix(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String permissionBase)
      Gets the highest numerical permission suffix of the base permission node it can find, if any.

      For example, if a player has "permission.node.1" and "permission.node.2", this method would return (the OptionalInt of) 2.

      Parameters:
      player - The player whose permissions to check.
      permissionBase - The base permission. In the example above, this would be "permission.node." (note the '.' at the end).
      Returns:
      The highest numerical suffix of the base permission node if it exists, otherwise an empty OptionalInt.

    • hasPermission

      boolean hasPermission(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String permissionNode)
      Checks if a player has a certain permission node or not.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose permissions to check.

      This player CANNOT be offline or a fake player! Use hasPermissionOffline(World, OfflinePlayer, String) instead.

      permissionNode - The permission node to check.
      Returns:
      True if the player has the permission node.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the provided player is offline or a fake player.

    • hasPermissionOffline

      CompletableFuture<Boolean> hasPermissionOffline(org.bukkit.World world, org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player, String permission)
      Asynchronously checks if an (offline) player has a certain permission node.
      Parameters:
      world - The world to check in.
      player - The player whose permissions to check.
      permission - The permission node to check.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that will be completed with true if the player has the permission node, false

    • hasBypassPermissionsForAttribute

      boolean hasBypassPermissionsForAttribute(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, StructureAttribute structureAttribute)
      Checks if a player has bypass permissions for a specific attribute.

      Having bypass permissions means that a player is able to access a given attribute for structures even if they are not co-owners of those structures.

      Parameters:
      player - The player whose permissions to check.
      structureAttribute - The attribute of the Structure for which to verify if the player has bypass permissions.
      Returns:
      True if the player has bypass permissions for the attribute.

    • isOp

      boolean isOp(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Checks if the given player is a server operator or not.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check.
      Returns:
      True if the player is a server operator on this server.
